name: NSScrubberImageItemView
desc: A concrete view subclass for displaying images in a scrubber items.

items.name: var image: NSImage
items.desc: The image displayed by the scrubber item.

items.name: var imageView: NSImageView
items.desc: The image view that the scrubber item uses to display its image.

items.name: var imageAlignment: NSImageAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the image within the scrubber item.
